# Government Tender Announcement 

## Official Information

*   **Tender Title:** Catering Services
*   **Reference Number:** cb-71-38895899
*   **Solicitation Number:** 21301-25-4895720
*   **Publication Date:** 2024-10-31
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-11-29T14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2025-01-01
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-12-31

## Contract Details

*   **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
*   **Procurement Category:** SRV

## Tender Description

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is seeking a contractor to provide food catering services for the Correctional Training Program at the Correctional Learning and Development Centre located in Laval, Quebec. The selected contractor will be responsible for providing three meals a day for approximately 16 to 20 recruits per cohort, with four cohorts held annually.

## Evaluation Criteria

The contractor's bid will be evaluated based on the lowest price. All interested suppliers are invited to submit a bid. The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

## Required Documents

To participate in this tender, interested suppliers must download the solicitation document and associated documents from the Canada Buys/Tender Opportunities website.

Note to bidders: A debriefing session can be requested within 15 working days of the bid solicitation process. The contract will be awarded to the contractor with the lowest price.

## Contact Information

For any inquiries or questions related to this tender, please contact Adriana Salvatore at:

*   Telephone: (514) 234-5127
*   Email: Adriana.Salvatore@csc-scc.gc.ca
